sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import HeroSection from '../common/HeroSection'; import ServiceCard from '../common/ServiceCard'; import Button from '../common/Button'; import SkygateTravelLogo from '../logos/SkygateTravelLogo'; const TravelPage = () => { const services = [ { icon: ( ), title: "Corporate Travel Management", description: "Comprehensive corporate travel solutions with cost optimization, policy compliance, and detailed reporting for business travel." }, { icon: ( ), title: "Leisure Travel Planning", description: "Personalized leisure travel experiences with expert planning, exclusive deals, and unforgettable destinations worldwide." }, { icon: ( ), title: "Group Travel Coordination", description: "Expert coordination for group travel including corporate retreats, family reunions, and special events with seamless logistics." }, { icon: ( ), title: "Travel Booking Services", description: "Complete booking services for flights, hotels, car rentals, and activities with access to exclusive rates and promotions." }, { icon: ( ), title: "24/7 Travel Support", description: "Round-the-clock travel support and assistance for emergencies, changes, and travel-related inquiries." } ]; const features = [ "Access to exclusive travel deals and promotions", "Personalized travel recommendations and planning", "Real-time flight and hotel availability", "Emergency travel assistance and support", "Travel insurance and protection options", "Mobile app for easy booking and management", "Corporate travel policy compliance", "Detailed travel reporting and analytics" ]; const destinations = [ { name: "Europe", image: "üèõÔ∏è", description: "Historic cities and cultural experiences" }, { name: "Asia", image: "üèÆ", description: "Exotic destinations and ancient traditions" }, { name: "Americas", image: "üóΩ", description: "Diverse landscapes and vibrant cultures" }, { name: "Africa", image: "ü¶Å", description: "Wildlife safaris and natural wonders" }, { name: "Oceania", image: "üèùÔ∏è", description: "Island paradises and adventure" }, { name: "Middle East", image: "üïå", description: "Rich history and modern luxury" } ]; return (
{/* Premium Hero Section */} { const element = document.getElementById('travel-services'); if (element) { window.scrollTo({ top: element.offsetTop - 100, behavior: 'smooth' }); } } } ]} /> {/* Premium Services Section */}
{/* Premium background elements */}

Our Travel Services

Comprehensive travel solutions designed to make your journey seamless, memorable, and cost-effective

Global Reach Expert Planning 24/7 Support Best Prices
{services.map((service, index) => (
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.description}

Professional travel consultants
Competitive pricing
Round-the-clock support
Personalized experiences
))}
{/* Our Travel Process */}
{/* Premium background elements */}

Our Travel Process

From consultation to departure, we ensure every step of your journey is perfectly planned and executed

{/* Consultation & Planning */}

Consultation & Planning

{[ { step: "Initial Consultation", desc: "Understanding your travel preferences, budget, and requirements" }, { step: "Destination Research", desc: "Comprehensive research on destinations, attractions, and local insights" }, { step: "Itinerary Creation", desc: "Custom itinerary tailored to your interests and schedule" }, { step: "Booking Management", desc: "Handling all reservations, tickets, and accommodation bookings" }, { step: "Pre-Travel Briefing", desc: "Final preparations, documents, and travel tips" } ].map((item, index) => (
{index + 1}

{item.step}

{item.desc}

))}
{/* Travel & Support */}

Travel & Support

{[ { step: "Departure Support", desc: "Assistance with check-in, airport transfers, and departure logistics" }, { step: "In-Destination Service", desc: "Local support, guides, and 24/7 assistance during your trip" }, { step: "Experience Management", desc: "Ensuring all activities, tours, and experiences run smoothly" }, { step: "Emergency Support", desc: "Round-the-clock assistance for any travel emergencies or changes" }, { step: "Return & Follow-up", desc: "Post-travel support and feedback collection for future improvements" } ].map((item, index) => (
{index + 1}

{item.step}

{item.desc}

))}
{/* Popular Destinations */}
{/* Premium background elements */}
